org.drip.math.function

Class AbstractUnivariate

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.math.function.AbstractUnivariate
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ExponentialTension, HyperbolicTension, NaturalLogSeriesElement, Polynomial, RationalShapeControl, Span, UnivariateConvolution, UnivariateReflection

    public abstract class AbstractUnivariate
extends java.lang.Object
    AbstractUnivariate provides the evaluation of the objective function and its derivatives for a specified variate. Default implementation of the derivatives are for non-analytical black box objective functions.
